name: Escape from Exodus Prime!
description:
A game made for Ludum Dare #46.

Theme: Keep It Alive

Escape from Exodus Prime is about saving the remaining people alive on a now toxic world. The environment is progressively getting worse and lowering the food production of Exodus Prime. Your mission is to colonize the other planets in the system, so the population from Exodus Prime can escape and live. Good luck!

This is the first game I've ever completed. I'm certain it is riddle with bugs, logic errors, and inefficiencies. But I don't care! I made it and that's a win for me. 

Update:

1. Fixed a bug that caused the game to crash after the tutorial/instructions section.

2. Fixed a bug that caused a crash due to a missing variable in the Food/Death section of Exodus Prime.
